name: Light Attack
description:
Warning:this is a prototype and absolutely will not be the final version

but is the base form of the game,Development will continue if the game is liked by players

Are you ready to shoot the hell out of the extraterrestrial murderers known as

HOMOSEPIANS for retribution and glory.

Light Attack is a bullet hell shooter that takes place in the deep cosmos to defend your planet.Its based on retro space shooters like space invaders and and batsugun .Its made to give you nostalgia,anxiety and intense battles.

The game is still in alpha stage so alot has to come and i hope you could give us feedback on playability,gameplay and art.

CONTROLS:

Movement:WASD

Firing:Left mouse button
